scripts.test: npm install && cd Tests && npm install && node test.js && cd .. && npm run lint && echo Test Suite Finished with exit code 0!
scripts.qa: npm install && cd Tests && npm install && node test.js --fast && cd .. && npm run lint && echo Test Suite Finished with exit code 0!
scripts.qad: npm install && cd Tests && npm install && node test.js --fast --debug && cd .. && npm run lint && echo Test Suite Finished with exit code 0!
